channel.title: Are extra "objects" a bug? [Fixed]
channel.description:
For example, in the break room, underneath (actually colliding into) the soda vending machine is an orange soda can. It's on the left or right bottom corner.
I suspect that there are two monitors in this spot: the security room in the box jumping crane room. in this screenshot, because it (and only it) flickers very rapidly. [img]https://cloud.steampowered.com/ugc/594730184119285150/B00053A19E26666416C3B78C863555F92058C56E/[/img]
Missing textures?
Same room as above, the shorn end of a girder seems to be missing some texture, as circled: ![](upload://AnwTb5hiUQbFhlSGIJoQhYcNCWU.jpeg)
Hall of Mirrors effect here, that scene where a scientist gets pulled into a vent: [img]https://cloud.steampowered.com/ugc/594730184119318769/3981B71D074FC7E89E354B1AB51B5C11A914208D/[/img] Exterior: [img]https://cloud-2.steampowered.com/ugc/594730184119448329/35CFBCCDBC0762D04477DB9800493DC766A03DDB/[/img]

item.title: Are extra "objects" a bug? [Fixed]
item.dc:creator: PlNG
item.description:
For example, in the break room, underneath (actually colliding into) the soda vending machine is an orange soda can. It’s on the left or right bottom corner.

I suspect that there are two monitors in this spot: the security room in the box jumping crane room. in this screenshot, because it (and only it) flickers very rapidly.

Missing textures?

Same room as above, the shorn end of a girder seems to be missing some texture, as circled:
